markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impossible Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=1779) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 133 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Ubiquitous Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=539)

</column>

---

You can create endless shorter-lived snares, protecting your lair or using them against foes. Once per minute, you can [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) one of the snares you've prepared for quick deployment without expending the prepared snare. Once deployed, such a snare lasts for 10 minutes before losing its effectiveness.
name: Impossible Snares
